name: <task::scheduler::fifo_scheduler::FifoScheduler<T> as task::scheduler::Scheduler<T>>::enqueue

task::scheduler::info::CommonSchedInfo::.doc: Gets the CPU that the task is running on or lately ran on.

task::scheduler::info::AtomicCpuId::set_.doc:
Sets the inner value of an `AtomicCpuId` if it's empty.

 The return value is a result indicating whether the new value was written
 and containing the previous value. If the previous value is empty, it returns
 `Ok(())`. Otherwise, it returns `Err(previous_value)` which the previous
 value is a valid CPU ID.

core::cmp::PartialEq::ne.doc:
Tests for `!=`. The default implementation is almost always sufficient,
 and should not be overridden without very good reason.

core::panicking::panic.doc: The underlying implementation of core's `panic!` macro when no formatting is used.

core::ops::Index::index.doc:
Performs the indexing (`container[index]`) operation.

 # Panics

 May panic if the index is out of bounds.

sync::spin::SpinLock::<T>::disable_irq.doc: Converts the guard behavior from disabling preemption to disabling IRQs.
